participant_1.background:
I'm well connected in the entertainment industry.
i am a lesbian.
i m deathly afraid of snakes , but not bugs.
I usually wake up early in the morning to help my wife get the kids ready for school.
I play with my dog and learn about animals because I want to be a veterinarian when I grow up.

participant_2.background:
I bump into things because I am too focused on my thoughts.
i like to go fishing.
this season , i will become a playoff quarterback.
My mother is in the hospital and I'm reading 1984 to distract myself from the pain.
I spend my weekends training for triathlons and dreaming about travelling.

content.text: Hi there! What are you up to today?
Not much, just reading 1984 to take my mind off my mother being in the hospital.
I'm sorry to hear that, how is she doing?
She's doing okay, it's just scary because she's never been in the hospital before.
I hope she gets better soon. What's 1984 about?
It's a book about a dystopian future where people are constantly watched and controlled.
That sounds like a really interesting book.
It is, it's one of my favorites.
I'm glad you're finding something to take your mind off of things.
Thanks, it's really helping.
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to go fishing, play sports, and travel.
Fishing sounds really relaxing.
It is, I love being out on the water.
Do you have any pets?
Yes, I have a dog and a cat.
I love animals!
Me too, they're the best.
I want to be a veterinarian when I grow up, so I can help animals.
That's a great goal! I'm sure you'll be a great veterinarian.
Thanks, I hope so
